examples.title: Fortune 500 Through The Ages
examples.author: Nicolas Rapp
examples.note: A bubble chart of top 500 American companies by revenue and by industry from 1780 to 2018.

examples.title: Tax Rates Across U.S. Companies
examples.author: The New York Times
examples.note: This chart is a series of one dimensional bubble charts. Each circle size represents company's earning.

examples.title: Lunar Conversations
examples.author: Nicholas Rougeux
examples.note: A timeline of the conversations between Earth and the spacecraft of the Apollo 11 mission from liftoff to splashdown. The number of words spoken is visualized as a bubble chart along the timeline.

examples.title: Snake Oil Supplements?
examples.author: David McCandless
examples.note: This one dimensional bubble chart is sorting food supplements into categories by evidence of usefulness.
